actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Currency and Housing
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Currency and Housing.

official_title: A bill to amend the Truth in Lending Act to require lenders to post current interest rates charged for various categories of loans to consumers.

summary.text: Requires, under the Truth in Lending Act, creditors to post a sign at each place of business where he extends credit to consumers which states clearly and conspicuously the current rates of interest being charged for each category of loan.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Truth in Lending Act to require lenders to post current interest rates charged for various categories of loans to consumers.
